required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Myo-inositol and Vitamin D3 During IVF
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of Supplementation With Myo-inositol, Vitamin D3, Folic Acid and Melatonin on IVF Outcomes

brief_summary.textblock:
Administration of a multicomponent dietary supplement (myo-inositol, vitamin D3, folic acid and melatonin) to women undergoing IVF procedures.
The aim of the study is to monitor the effects on the pregnancy, implantation and abortion rates.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Single time-point: at 6 weeks of pregnancy
primary_outcome.description: number of gestational sacs observed at ecographic screening divided by the number of embryos transferred

primary_outcome.time_frame: Single time-point: respectively, 12 days and 15 days after the beginning of Controlled Ovarian Hyperstimulation
primary_outcome.description: Classification of the morphological aspects under the optical microscope

primary_outcome.time_frame: Single time-point: at 14 days from embryo transfer
primary_outcome.description: Positive beta-hCG test after embryo transfer

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Single time-point: at 6 weeks of pregnancy
secondary_outcome.description: Multiple gestational sacs observed at ecographic screening

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Single time-point: at 6 weeks of pregnancy

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of FSH IU used for controlled ovarian hyperstimulation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Single time-point: about 10 days after the beginning of Controlled Ovarian Hyperstimulation
secondary_outcome.description: Ovarian ultrasound investigation and serum estradiol level

intervention.description: 2 g Myo-Inositol, 50 mg Alpha-Lactalbumin and 200 µg folic acid (1 sachet/day in the morning): from the first day of the menstrual cycle until 14 days after embryo transfer. If pregnancy occurs, until the 12th week of gestation. 600 mg Myo-Inositol, 200 µg folic acid, 1 mg melatonin (1 soft capsule/day in the evening): from the first day of the menstrual cycle until hCG administration. If pregnancy occurs, until the 12th week of gestation.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- BMI (kg/m2): 18.5 - 24.9
- basal FSH on day 3 <15 mIU/ml
Exclusion Criteria:
- presence of insulin resistance (IR)
- hyperglycaemia, hyperprolactinemia, hypothyroidism or androgen excess
- diagnosis of PCOS (according to Rotterdam ESHRE-ASRM Sponsored PCOS consensus workshop group)
- intake of hormones or drugs that can potentially influence the ovulation
- FSH>15 on day 3
